description: One of Maiku`s close friends who becomes a bit too friendly with him. He is a bisexual and can be seen trying to flirt with Kamishiro to an extent that when Maiku is needed money, he actually tells Maiku that if he stayed with him for a night, he would give as much as Maiku wanted but instead Maiku punches him as the result of many of their conversations.
name: Shimazaki Kousei
